darkhistory.electrons.ics¶

Functions for computing ICS spectra integrated over the CMB.

Modules

BE_integrals Integrals over the Bose-Einstein distribution.
engloss_diff_terms Functions for computing the ICS energy loss spectrum by small parameter expansion.
ics_cooling Electron cooling through ICS.
ics_engloss_spectrum Nonrelativistic ICS spectrum after integrating over CMB.
ics_spectrum Nonrelativistic ICS spectrum after integrating over CMB.
nonrel_diff_terms Functions for computing the nonrelativistic ICS spectrum by beta expansion.
